page.title: 02Village Survey
page.content: The {survey}was carried out in the part of{Mintlaw}which fell within our block.This comprises almost all the original village including all the shops,the pre-war additions to housing,those in{50's,60's}and early { {70's}and a large private estate built {1972-1985}.It does not include the 350 council houses built in {1975-1978 nor the private housing built in that side of the village in the{80's}. 250 responses were received from the 500 houses in the{Mintlaw}area which was covered i.e.{50%}.The area was canvassed by the pupils over one week during the late afternoons or early evenings. In {Longside }the whole village was included but the survey was carried out one morning.There were answers from {38% }of the houses. {
